title: Introducing: Let's Away
body: It’s bizarre the coincidences that life throws up from time to time. Take **Let’s Away**, the North East’s current ‘buzz band’, whom having heard a couple of tracks from the duo and deciding to write about them, I, as I always do, performed a quick Google search to gather some more information on the two-piece, and promptly discovered that I used to play football alongside one of their members. Strange, huh? Anyway, all that aside, the two tracks that **Let’s Away** have unleashed so far are emotionally fraught slices of indie-pop, taking on a very 60’s-esque mantra, and verging upon becoming full-blown ballads. _Only In The Dark_ is a slow-burner; melodic and despondent in style, like **Alex Turner** at his utmost remorseful, whereas _Art Of Self Control_ displays a rougher edge, retelling a seemingly extremely personal affair. Whilst the duo’s [website](http://letsawaymusic.wordpress.com/) looks rather bare at the moment, and they’re yet to perform live, I anticipate it only being a matter of time before they begin to cause some serious waves. Check out both tracks below.

Take Let’s Away, the North East’s current ‘buzz band’, whom having heard a couple of tracks from the duo and deciding to write about them, I, as I always do, performed a quick Google search to gather some more information on the two-piece, \[…\]
